element.name: wallets
element.label: ARK wallet address
element.description: You can insert multiple ARK wallets separated by semicolons.

element.name: mainNodeApi
element.label: Main node api url
element.description: The main node url for the HTTP request which will be used mainly. Format: http://my.ark.node:port/api

element.name: backupNodeApi
element.label: Backup node api url
element.description: The backup node url for the HTTP request which will be used when the main node is not available. Format: http://my.ark.node:port/api

element.name: confirmations
element.label: Confirmations
element.description: How many network confirmations do the transaction need to be accepted?

element.name: paymentStatus
element.label: Payment Status
element.description: The Payment Status that will be set after the transaction reaches the minimum confirmations.

element.name: vendorField
element.label: VendorField Layout
element.description: The vendorField Layout for the transaction. You can implement {$ordernumber} in the layout. Keep in mind that the vendorField can only contain maximum 64 chars including the ordernumber which is dynamic and unique for each order.

element.name: sendMail
element.label: Send order status mail
element.description: If this option is checked the order status mail will be sent out when the order reached the configured payment status.
